lyrics.text: 《Metaphysics》 (Remastered)
Where form and essence surround / 在形式与本质的交汇处，
The world unfolds without a sound. / 世界悄然展开。
Hidden laws in all things, / 隐藏在万物中的原理，
From these roots, science is found. / 科学由此诞生。
The nature of truth lies beyond sight, / 真理的本质深藏于视线之外，
Speak of the present, and it's already dies. / 说出现在，现在就成了过去。
Every moment is worth reflecting， / 每一瞬间都值得思考，
The world will never stop turning, / 世界永不停歇地转动，
And we will never stop asking. / 而我们不会停止追问。
"Everything has a cause," you say, / "万物皆有因，"你说，
But the answers always hide away. / 可答案总藏在后面。
We stare, we smile, then stare, / 我们凝视，微笑，再凝视，
Force drives all, but time stands still. / 力推动一切，时间侧证静止。
You agree with Heraclitus' flow, / 你也赞同赫拉克利特的流变，
An eternal dance we both know. / 这是我们都知晓的永恒舞蹈。
Caught between matter and thought, / 夹杂在物质与思想之间，
Reason and passion pull us in knots. / 理性与感性交织缠绕。
The essence of truth, beyond our eyes, / 真理的本质，超越我们的视界，
Speak of the now, and it slips by. / 说出现在，它已悄然消逝。
Each moment, a thought worth chasing, / 每一瞬间都值得追逐，
The world spins and spins, / 世界不停地旋转，
And we keep thinking. / 而我们继续思索。
